briefTitle: Rufinamide Given as Adjunctive Therapy in Participants With Refractory Partial Seizures
officialTitle: A Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel-Group Study of Rufinamide Given as Adjunctive Therapy in Patients With Refractory Partial Seizures
summary: To evaluate the effect of rufinamide on total partial seizure frequency in adolescent and adult participants (12 to 80 years, inclusive) with refractory partial onset seizures maintained on a maximum of 3 stable antiepileptic drugs (AEDs).

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage Change in Total Partial Seizure Frequency Per 28 Days During Maintenance Phase Relative to the Baseline Phase
